```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(lubridate)
library(readr)
theme_set(theme_classic())
```

```{r}
# 匯率以2017年1月為基期
exData7 <- read_csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/tpemartin/github-data/master/exData7.csv")
```

```{r}
exData7 %>%
  mutate(
    升值=(月升值率>0)
  ) -> exData7
exData7 %>%
  filter(幣別=="新台幣NTD/USD",年份 %>% between(1990,1995)) -> exDataTWpost90s
```

```{r}
exDataTWpost90s %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=月升值率))+
  geom_histogram() -> p3
p3
```
